TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlHistory extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlHistory Implements IDisposable
public ref class HtmlHistory sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 管理使用者在目前工作階段內瀏覽過的文件和網站清單。

span.span: Manages the list of documents and Web sites the user has visited within the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Managed HTML 文件物件模型 (DOM) 會追蹤的使用者內瀏覽過的站台指定*工作階段*。The managed HTML Document Object Model (DOM) keeps track of the sites that a user has visited within a given *session*. A*工作階段*裝載 managed 的 HTML DOM 應用程式啟動，直到應用程式關閉時定義為的時間長度。A *session* is defined as the length of time from when an application hosting the managed HTML DOM starts until the application closes. 當您使用屬性或方法控制瀏覽至新的網頁，Internet Explorer 可以從伺服器擷取該頁面的最新版本，或者顯示在目前的版本Internet Explorer 快取。When you use the property or method of the control to navigate to a new Web page, Internet Explorer may either retrieve the latest version of that page from the server or display the version that is currently in the Internet Explorer cache. 相反地，當您使用向前及向後巡覽這個堆疊中時，Internet Explorer 會顯示的頁面從本機電腦的快取下載的 Web 內容，除非伺服器指出文件的內容應該過期立即。By contrast, when you use to navigate forward and backward in this stack, Internet Explorer will display the pages from the local computer's cache of downloaded Web content, unless the server indicates that the document's content should expire immediately. 如需有關記錄清單，Internet Explorer 中的快取的詳細資訊，請參閱文件 234067，「 如何以避免快取中 Internet Explorer 中，「 Microsoft 知識庫中在[ http://support.microsoft.com ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37115)。For more information on the history list and caching in Internet Explorer, see article 234067, "How To Prevent Caching in Internet Explorer," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at [http://support.microsoft.com](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37115). 主要方法是，其中巡覽至巡覽堆疊中的指定位置或以新的統一資源定位器 (URL)。The principal method of is , which navigates either to the specified position in the navigation stack or to a new Uniform Resource Locator (URL). 和方法瀏覽下和向上巡覽堆疊中，分別由所需的項目數目。The and methods navigate down and up the navigation stack, respectively, by the required number of entries.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Back(int32 numberBack) cil managed

param.name: numberBack
param.span: 在巡覽堆疊中要往後巡覽的項目數。

span.span: The number of entries to navigate backward in the navigation stack.

param.span: 這個數字必須是正整數。

span.span: This number must be a positive integer.

summary.span: 在巡覽堆疊中往後巡覽指定的項目數。

span.span: Navigates backward in the navigation stack by the specified number of entries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果數提供給`numBack`超過先前已瀏覽在歷程記錄中的項目數控制項將會瀏覽歷程記錄中的第一個項目、 比方說，第一個統一資源定位器 (URL) 瀏覽目前期間瀏覽器工作階段。If the number supplied to `numBack` exceeds the number of previously visited entries in the history, the control will navigate to the first item in the history, for example, to the first Uniform Resource Locator (URL) visited during the current browser session. 如果沒有在巡覽堆疊中目前的頁面後面的項目，則呼叫會有任何作用，但它不會引發錯誤。If there are no entries behind the current page in the navigation stack, calling will have no effect, but it will not raise an error.

exception.span: 引數不是 32 位元的正整數。

span.span: Argument is not a positive 32-bit integer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，當您完成使用物件。Call the method when you are finished using the object. 離開中無法使用的狀態物件。 leaves the object in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 請務必呼叫您釋放最後一個參考之前。Always call before you release your last reference to . 否則，資源是使用將不會釋放記憶體回收行程呼叫的物件之前`Finalize`方法。Otherwise, the resources is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DomHistory As Object
public: property System::Object ^ DomHistory { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個類別所包裝的 Unmanaged 介面。

span.span: Gets the unmanaged interface wrapped by this class.
An that can be cast into an interface pointer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須將參考加入至 unmanaged MSHTML.dll 才能使用。You will need to add a reference to the unmanaged MSHTML.dll in order to use . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[匯入類型程式庫當成組件](~/docs/framework/interop/importing-a-type-library-as-an-assembly.md)。For more information, see [Importing a Type Library as an Assembly](~/docs/framework/interop/importing-a-type-library-as-an-assembly.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Forward(int32 numberForward) cil managed

param.name: numberForward
param.span: 在巡覽堆疊中要往前巡覽的項目數。

span.span: The number of entries to navigate forward in the navigation stack.

param.span: 這個數字必須是正整數。

span.span: This number must be a positive integer.

summary.span: 在巡覽堆疊中往前巡覽指定的項目數。

span.span: Navigates forward in the navigation stack by the specified number of entries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果數提供給`numForward`超過先前已瀏覽在歷程記錄中的項目數控制項將會瀏覽到最後一個項目歷程記錄。If the number supplied to `numForward` exceeds the number of previously visited entries in the history, the control will navigate to the last item in the history. 如果沒有晚於目前的頁面巡覽堆疊中的項目，則呼叫會有任何作用，但它不會引發錯誤。If there are no entries ahead of the current page in the navigation stack, calling will have no effect, but it will not raise an error.

exception.span: 引數不是 32 位元的正整數。

span.span: Argument is not a positive 32-bit integer.

summary.span: 巡覽至指定為統一資源定位器 (URL) 或巡覽堆疊中某個位置的網頁。

span.span: Navigates to a Web page specified as either a Uniform Resource Locator (URL) or a position in the navigation stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Go(int32 relativePosition) cil managed

param.name: relativePosition
param.span: 您想要在巡覽堆疊中顯示的項目。

span.span: The entry in the navigation stack you want to display.

summary.span: 巡覽至瀏覽器記錄中的指定相對位置。

span.span: Navigates to the specified relative position in the browser's history.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用負數的引數相當於使用方法; 相反地，使用正數的引數相當於使用方法。Using with a negative argument is equivalent to using the method; conversely, using with a positive argument is equivalent to using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Go(string urlString) cil managed

param.name: urlString

span.span: The URL you want to display.

param.span: 這個 URL 可以是相對或虛擬 URL (例如 page.html、path/page.html 或 /path/to/page.html)，不論是哪一種情況，目前網頁的 URL 都會當做基底使用。

span.span: This may be a relative or virtual URL (for example, page.html, path/page.html, or /path/to/page.html), in which case the current Web page's URL is used as a base.

summary.span: 巡覽至指定的統一資源定位器 (URL)。

span.span: Navigates to the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用相當於使用屬性或方法控制項。Using is equivalent to using either the property or the method of the control.

span.span: Navigates to the specified Uniform Resource Locator (URL).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用相當於使用屬性或方法控制項。Using is equivalent to using either the property or the method of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Length As Integer
public: property int Length { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the size of the history stack.

value.span: 目前在統一資源定位器 (URL) 記錄中的項目數。

span.span: The current number of entries in the Uniform Resource Locator (URL) history.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要判斷有多少項目之前或之後在巡覽堆疊中目前的 URL，您必須自行維護這個計數。If you want to determine how many entries exist before or after the current URL in the navigation stack, you will have to maintain this count yourself.
